subject: Re: [PATCH resend 1/2] sched: psi: loosen clock sync between scheduler and aggregator

reviews.author: Johannes Weiner (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Johannes Weiner raised concerns about clock synchronization between scheduler and aggregator, suggesting alternative solutions for the aggregator side.
